content: for pattern support please go to the questions thread here 1 a simple and easy blanket style cardigan worked from top down **now available in spanish** thank you jessiqueando /people/jessiqueando **update 2016 - now available in portuguese** thank you katiapriscilla /people/katiapriscilla **update 2014 - now available in french** thank you mariannou 2 **update 2013 - now available in italian and german** thank you crepereia 3 and jettte 4 <small>republished on knit for peace 5 website with permission of designer </small> 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/designs-by-isabell-kraemer/3186954/1-25 2 http //www ravelry com/people/mariannou 3 http //www ravelry com/people/crepereia 4 http //www ravelry com/people/jettte 5 www knitforpeace org uk
